name: Smartwool PhD Run Ultra Light Ombre Print Micro Socks - Women's
categories: PhD Run Ultra Light Ombre Print Micro Socks
description: Put a colourful twist in your running wardrobe. These run-specific socks are made with Indestructawool and Shred Shield technology to go kilometer after kilometer. Ultra light cushion puts barely anything between you and your shoe for better ground feel.Made of soft merino wool, nylon, elastane and polyester.4-degree elite fit system uses 2 types of elastic for stretch, recovery and to keep the sock in place.Indestructawool Technology in high-impact areas for comfort.Mesh ventilation zones provide moisture management.Virtually Seamless™ toe for chafe-free wear.Narrower profile is designed to fit those with narrower feet.
